title: Haunting Embrace
description: In series of sorcery, Irish lore, time travel and romance, Meaghan Ballagh feels sorceress whose love for a druid ended in treachery. Meaghan is thrust into the past to feel the desire between the sorceress and the handsome druid rise again. To survive, she must piece together the history of the woman who haunts her and the man who needs her.
author: Erin Quinn
